result.instructions:
Order from preferred vendor
  - IBM
  - CDW
  - Dell

OR

Move from "In Stock" inventory. Locate CMDB CI that have status of "In Stock" and assign it to the requested item, this action will take it out of the "In Stock" status and assign the CI to the customer.
result.short_description: Order from vendor or move from in-stock inventory
result.name: Procure PC Hardware

result.instructions:
- Verify specification
- Connect all hardware/peripherals
- Bootup
- Image system
- Test system
result.short_description: Configure hardware and test system for initial bootup
result.name: Configure Hardware

result.instructions:
- Verify specification of requested item
- Install and configure required software
- System's test
- Configure networking
- Integration test: email, web
result.name: Configure Software

result.instructions: Deliver PC to IT Lab from receiving or move PC from stockroom
result.name: Deliver PC to IT Lab

result.instructions:
- Deliver PC to Customer location
- Install and bootup
- Observe customer logon
result.name: Deliver PC to Customer
